title: The Boss
description:
What do you do when your boss’s boss flirts with you, promises you a good time and nothing more, yet keeps coming back for more?
  Nate Lexington is one of New York’s most eligible bachelors and intends to keep it that way. He doesn’t let anyone get close…until a chance encounter with employee Ashlee Webb turns his world upside-down.  When Nate overhears Ashlee and a co-worker gossiping about the size of his “family jewels,” her friend gets suspended while Ashlee is asked to attend a company event with him.  Nate discovers her virgin submissiveness and is smitten. A relationship blossoms until he makes a knee-jerk decision that screws up everything.  Don’t miss The Boss, a new steamy romance from USA Today Bestselling Author, M. S. Parker.
author: M.S. Parker
